lore: Pilwiz communicate with each other through a curious language made up of hisses and croaks, reminiscent of the sounds of snakes and frogs. Maintaining the monopoly of a product is a complex task that requires firm and constant attention.\n\nPilwiz Slashers keep a low profile most of the time, but they get moving when they find out that someone plans to cultivate corn. These creatures are bloodthirsty murderers that eliminate the competition in a whirlwind of sharp strikes.
menagerieDialog: (No one works the land quite like the Pilwiz, but this one seems to prefer lazing around.)
(It's repeatedly slashing at the air with its scythes.)
(It's trimming some flowers, because what else is a creature with scythes for limbs supposed to do in their free time?)
(Its gaze is lost in the distance, as if yearning to be someplace else.)
(This creature's lifelong dream is to become a gardener. Unfortunately for it, you've decided to enlist it into a lifetime of warfare.)
name: Pilwiz Slasher
